ix steps down to await the Council.

ause.

her, Ironhide at

n. In the centre of all the

  > > > > an energon fountain.=
 It harmoneusly gushes a soft pink energy,
  > > that
  > > > > gives the r=
oom a light pink colour.

 crowd, as a red old Autobot, at
  > > the top
  > > > > and centre of the =
room stands up. He then begins to speak, and
  > the
  > > > > other Autobo=
ts follow his every word. "Greetings Pacifix" he
  > says
  > > in a
  > > =
> > rough deep voice. The Autobot Ironhide's voice can be heard by
  > > al=
l. He
  > > > > speaks with wisdom, and kind words. To his right and left,
=
  > > standing
  > > > > behind him are Sunstreaker and Sideswipe, his body=
 guards. To
  > his
  > > > > right sitting down is his peer, the old Autob=
ot known as Kup,
  > who
  > > > > watches all of this with an unussually s=
ense of calmness.
  > Beside
  > > him
  > > > > is the once human, now rob=
ot Spike. A few more recognizable
  > > Autobots
  > > > > sit around. "As =
you know" Ironhide continues, "We have finally
  > > > > achieved what we s=
et out to millions of years ago. Peace" he
  > says,
  > > > > every robot =
in the room nodding at the last word. "But it is an
  > > uneasy
  > > > > =
peace, for even though we have all but stopped the Decepticons,
  > we
  > =
> > > have reasons to believe their decendants, the Predacons, do not
  > >=
 follow
  > > > > this peace willfully" he says in a grave tone. "We even h=
ave
  > > strong
  > > > > evidence that points to the fact that they have =
released
  > > Decepticon
  > > > > war Criminals from confinment, to try t=
o change time on the
  > planet
  > > > > Earth" he says, thinking back to =
that time, four million years
  > > ago,
  > > > > when the Ark, and Nemesi=
s crash landed on the planet, bringing
  > to
  > > it
  > > > > their mill=
ion year Strugle. He remembers the battles they had
  > > there,
  > > > > =
and how it helped turn the tide of War for the Autobots. "We
  > sent
  > >=
 a

y
  > > have
  > > > > not made contact with us however, and their ship is =
not
  > emmiting a
  > > > > signal. We fear the Predacons may be on to us.=
 That is why we
  > have
  > > > > summoned you Pacifix. The Predacons will=
 not notice if a rookie
  > > > > commander goes missing, but we have reaso=
n to believe you are
  > the
  > > > > perfect leader for this mission. We =
also know that one of your
  > > friends
  > > > > was in that scout ship, =
and understand you will most likely
  > want
  > > to
  > > > > retrieve hi=
m. We have faith in your Pacifist reasoning, and
  > think
  > > you
  > > =
> > would best represent us. We have already selected a few Autobot
  > > >=
 > veterans to go with you, and we understand you are also putting
  > a
  =
> > crew
  > > > > of you own together" Ironhide says, pausing for Pacifix =
to
